tool_description: Get publicly accessible information from StockX.com using our Scraper API. Get Information such as Search Results, Product Information, Product Price History, and URL extraction.
name: StockX
title: StockX

api_list.name: Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results from a Keyword and other filters.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Options: most-popular, recent-asks, recent-bids, most-expensive, top-selling, price-volatility, price-premium, last-sale, lowest-ask, highest-bid, release-date

api_list.name: Get Search Results from URL
api_list.description:
Get Search Results from a URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.

api_list.name: Get Product

required_parameters.name: productID
required_parameters.description: Can be found on other Endpoints such as Search, and Extract URL.

api_list.name: Get Product from URL
Get Category Results from URL
api_list.description: Get Category Results from a URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Category Page URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.
This will also work on Brand pages.
For example:

- https://stockx.com/baseball
- https://stockx.com/gucci
- https://stockx.com/new-balance

api_list.name: Extract URL
